alert.note: Alert for Delta; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Delta and northeastern Menominee Counties through 1145 PM EDT/1045 PM CDT/... At 1114 PM EDT/1014 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Branche, or 20 miles northwest of Escanaba, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Branche and Cornell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
